full_summary:
Title: [Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA)] Alterations to Canada Border Services Agency Vessel
==================================================================

 issuing Authority: [PSPC][Department of Public Works and Government Services (DPWGS)]

**Tender Reference Number: WS4419392969**
--------------------------------------------------------


### Abstract

The Department of Public Works and Government Services invites qualified contractors to participate in a tender for the alterations to the Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) vessel at the Quai Richelieu Detachment in accordance with the attached solicitation documents.

### Important Notice

Please note that the closing time for all submissions has been modified. All required supporting documentation and responses must be submitted no later than **March 20, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST**.

### Background

The alterations to the CBSA vessel will be carried out by the selected contractor in accordance with the solicitation documents. The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) reserves the right to modify or cancel this tender at any time without notice.

### Tender Requirements

The selected contractor must:

- Perform the required alterations to the CBSA vessel at the Quai Richelieu Detachment in accordance with the solicitation documents.
- Ensure compliance with all relevant policies, procedures, and regulations.

### Schedule

- Tender Closing Date: **March 20, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST**.
- Expected Contract Start Date: None.
- Expected Contract End Date: **March 31, 2024**.

### Contact Information

For further information or inquiries regarding this tender opportunity, please contact:

- Name: [Haitham Abbas - PSPC]
- Email: [haitham.abbas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca]

### Note

This tender is subject to Canada's Trade Agreements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Bidders are responsible for ensuring they meet all requirements and qualifications prior to submission.

### Documents Attached

Please visit [Ariba Discovery][ariba-discovery-url] (https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19006925?extsite=MTkwMDY5MjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for the complete solicitation documents.

### Important

Only submissions received between March 20, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST, and **immediately prior to the tender closing**, will be accepted.
